content: top down shawl with a stunning lace border knitted with the softest yarn and a 10mm needle this shawl is bound to turn heads yarn 3 skeins of hedgehog fibres super bulky 100% merino 82m/150g the colourway pictured is moon stone needle us15 / 10mm needles shawl is worked flat but circular needle might be beneficial as there s a large number of stitches towards the end adjust needle size to obtain correct gauge gauge 7 sts and 11 row = 4 / 10 cm in stockinette blocked lightly by washing and laying flat to dry
